content: Nathanael Arkor changed the access permissions for this stream from Public to Web-public.

Matteo Capucci (he/him) changed the description for this stream.

  • Old description:

applying categories, operads and the like to physics

  • New description:

Deprecated, use #theory: science instead. applying categories, operads and the like to physics
Matteo Capucci (he/him) renamed stream theory: physics to deprecated: physics.
